item.title: FAQ
item.description: About Heading Frequently Asked Questions Is IELTS required to apply in the Finnish universities? – Yes, Finnish universities require an overall band score of 6.5 for IELTS. All of them accept IELTS Academic test while some universities also accept IELTS Indicator test. However, IELTS General test is not accepted for university level studies. How much is the application fee to Finnish universities? – There is no application fee to the Finnish universities.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: About Heading FEOTA Privacy Policy Federation of Experts On Theoretical & Applied Sciences, also known as FEOTA Oy, is a limited liability company (Osakeyhtiö) based in Finland. FEOTA’s privacy policy complies with General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), applicable as of 25 May 2018, in all member states to harmonize data privacy laws across Europe. To access the official PDF of the Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation), visit GDPR page.
